title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks attempt comeback following back-to-back sell-off - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks attempt comeback following back-to-back sell-off  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks bounced back in the final hour of trading Thursday to cap a choppy session in the green as investors continued to mull a hawkish readout of minutes from the Federal Reserveâ€™s last policy-setting meeting that suggested more aggressive monetary tightening is underway.
